    • Method Detail

      • findRelatedConceptsWithText

        @GET(value="/api/sync/findrelatedconcepts/v1")
Entities findRelatedConceptsWithText(@Query(value="text")
                                       String text,
                                       @QueryMap
                                       Map<String,Object> params)
                                     throws IodErrorException
        Query IDOL OnDemand for documents matching query text using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
        Parameters:
        text - The query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that match the query text
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithText

        @GET(value="/api/sync/findrelatedconcepts/v1")
Entities findRelatedConceptsWithText(@Query(value="apiKey")
                                       String apiKey,
                                       @Query(value="text")
                                       String text,
                                       @QueryMap
                                       Map<String,Object> params)
                                     throws IodErrorException
        Query IDOL OnDemand for documents matching query text using the given API key
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        text - The query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that match the query text
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithReference

        @GET(value="/api/sync/findrelatedconcepts/v1")
Entities findRelatedConceptsWithReference(@Query(value="reference")
                                            String reference,
                                            @QueryMap
                                            Map<String,Object> params)
                                          throws IodErrorException
        Query IDOL OnDemand for documents using query text from an object store object using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
        Parameters:
        reference - An IDOL OnDemand reference obtained from either the Expand Container or Store Object API. The contents of the object will be used as the query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that match the query text
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithReference

        @GET(value="/api/sync/findrelatedconcepts/v1")
Entities findRelatedConceptsWithReference(@Query(value="apiKey")
                                            String apiKey,
                                            @Query(value="reference")
                                            String reference,
                                            @QueryMap
                                            Map<String,Object> params)
                                          throws IodErrorException
        Query IDOL OnDemand for documents using query text from an object store object using the given API key
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        reference - An IDOL OnDemand reference obtained from either the Expand Container or Store Object API. The contents of the object will be used as the query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that match the query text
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithUrl

        @GET(value="/api/sync/findrelatedconcepts/v1")
Entities findRelatedConceptsWithUrl(@Query(value="url")
                                      String url,
                                      @QueryMap
                                      Map<String,Object> params)
                                    throws IodErrorException
        Query IDOL OnDemand for documents using query text from a url using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
        Parameters:
        url - A publicly accessible HTTP URL from which the query text can be retrieved
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that match the query text
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithUrl

        @GET(value="/api/sync/findrelatedconcepts/v1")
Entities findRelatedConceptsWithUrl(@Query(value="apiKey")
                                      String apiKey,
                                      @Query(value="url")
                                      String url,
                                      @QueryMap
                                      Map<String,Object> params)
                                    throws IodErrorException
        Query IDOL OnDemand for documents using query text from a url using the given API key
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        url - A publicly accessible HTTP URL from which the query text can be retrieved
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that match the query text
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithFile

        @Multipart
@POST(value="/api/sync/findrelatedconcepts/v1")
Entities findRelatedConceptsWithFile(@Part(value="apiKey")
                                                  String apiKey,
                                                  @Part(value="file")
                                                  retrofit.mime.TypedOutput file,
                                                  @PartMap
                                                  Map<String,Object> params)
                                     throws IodErrorException
        Query IDOL OnDemand for documents using query text in a file
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        file - A file containing the query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that match the query text
        Throws:
        IodErrorException
